## ARTHStoreDerivedState.redemptionRate property

Current redemption rate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redemptionRate: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

Note that the actual rate paid by a redemption transaction will depend on the amount of ARTH being redeemed.

Use [Fees.redemptionRate()](./arth-base.fees.redemptionrate.md) to calculate a precise redemption rate.
